issue.title: www.geekom.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.geekom.de/wasserkuehlung-pc-vs-luftkuehlung-pc/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.geekom.de%2Fwasserkuehlung-pc-vs-luftkuehlung-pc%2F) ### Comment > just a cookie ``` Username: @sonnyxq ``` ### Screenshots

`Anti-paywall filters (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/liamengland1/miscfilters/refs/heads/master/antipaywall.txt)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`

[https://www.google.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2CAnti-paywall%2520filters%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fliamengland1%2Fmiscfilters%2Frefs%2Fheads%2Fmaster%2Fantipaywall.txt%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=false&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CAdsBypasser%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fadsbypasser.github.io%2Freleases%2Fadsbypasser.full.es7.user.js%29%2CtinyShield%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%2Fnpm%2F%40list-kr%2Ftinyshield%40latest%2Fdist%2FtinyShield.user.js%29%2CYouTube%2520Alchemy%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fupdate.greasyfork.org%2Fscripts%2F521686%2FYouTube%2520Alchemy.user.js%29%2CBypass%2520All%2520Shortlinks%2520Debloated%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcodeberg.org%2FAmm0ni4%2Fbypass-all-shortlinks-debloated%2Fraw%2Fbranch%2Fmain%2FBypass_All_Shortlinks.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.6.17.18.19.20.21.22.208.255.256.257&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.21.1+%285081%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=true&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_recall=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=false&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.referrer=www.geekom.de&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=false&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.22631.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F138.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&win.wfp=true)
